title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\CertificateDescription\SubjectDescription
name: SubjectDescription
description:
These values describe fields in an issued X.509 certificate such as the distinguished name, subject alternative names, serial number, and lifetime.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateDescription.SubjectDescription

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.subject
params.description: Contains distinguished name fields such as the common name, location and / organization.

params.name: data.hex_serial_number
params.description: The serial number encoded in lowercase hexadecimal.

params.name: data.lifetime
params.description: For convenience, the actual lifetime of an issued certificate.

params.name: data.not_before_time
params.description: The time at which the certificate becomes valid.

params.name: data.not_after_time
params.description: The time after which the certificate is expired. Per RFC 5280, the validity period for a certificate is the period of time from not_before_time through not_after_time, inclusive. Corresponds to 'not_before_time' + 'lifetime' - 1 second.
